para.text: In determining whether to impose an administrative fine on a licensee for any violation under Transportation Article, Title 15, Annotated Code of Maryland, the Administration shall consider:
The deleterious effect of the violation on others;
Any acts of good faith on the part of the licensee;
The licensee's history of previous violations; and
Previous counseling or reprimands on the issues under consideration;
For submission of titling and registration data, fees, and taxes, in addition to §A of this regulation, the Administration shall consider the degree of lateness.

annotations.annotation: Transportation Article, §§12-104(b), 15-110.1, 15-212, 15-315, 15-514, 15-607, 15-710, and 15-807, Annotated Code of Maryland
